mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.chuangyexiangmu_id as chuangyexiangmuId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,chuangyexiangmu.chuangyexiangmu_name as chuangyexiangmuName ,chuangyexiangmu.jiaoshi_id as jiaoshiId ,chuangyexiangmu.chuangyexiangmu_photo as chuangyexiangmuPhoto ,chuangyexiangmu.leix_types as leixTypes ,chuangyexiangmu.chuangyexiangmu_content as chuangyexiangmuContent ,yonghu.username as username ,yonghu.password as password ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.sex_types as sexTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto
FROM chuangyexiangmu_collection a left JOIN chuangyexiangmu chuangyexiangmu ON a.chuangyexiangmu_id = chuangyexiangmu.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.chuangyexiangmu_id = #{params.chuangyexiangmuId}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and DATE_FORMAT(a.insert_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.insertTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.insert_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.insertTimeEnd} , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and chuangyexiangmu.chuangyexiangmu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.chuangyexiangmuName},'%')
and chuangyexiangmu.jiaoshi_id = #{params.jiaoshiId}
and chuangyexiangmu.leix_types = #{params.leixTypes}
and chuangyexiangmu.chuangyexiangmu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.chuangyexiangmuContent},'%')
and yonghu.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and yonghu.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
